Question
========
After performing a Repeated Measures ANOVA a researcher finds a F-ratio with df = 2, 12. How many people participated in this study?

Answerlist
----------
* 13
* 15
* 7
* 14


Solution
========
The correct answer is 7. You have 2 conditions (2) and 7 measures per condition. You can perform n-1 per condition (12), but you have to remind yourself that this is a within-subjects design, meaning that the ratings in condition 2 are from the same participants as condition 1.
